Uses of Package
fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.histories

  • Packages that use fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.histories 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars
    Variables for HIOA simulation models.
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.histories
    Variables for HIOA simulation models.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.histories used by fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars 
    Class and Description
    ValueHistory
    The class ValueHistory implements a history mechanism for model variables to memorise its most recent values over a predefined time sliding window in a buffer.
    ValueHistoryFactoryI
    The interface ValueHistoryFactoryI declares the method to be called to create a value history from a factory.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.histories used by fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.histories 
    Class and Description
    ConstrainedIncrementalInterpolatorGeneratorI
    The interface ConstrainedIncrementalInterpolatorGeneratorI defines the methods offered by a generator of constrained interpolation functions for functions defined over points, constrained by their known first derivative, and that can be incrementally extended by progressively adding new points at the end of the current domain.
    ConstrainedInterval
    The class ConstrainedInterval implements a real value interval where end points are constrained by known first derivatives, and which is used in the definition of piecewise functions.
    IncrementalInterpolatorGeneratorI
    The interface IncrementalInterpolatorGeneratorI defines the methods offered by a generator of interpolation functions for functions defined over points that can be incrementally extended by progressively adding new points at the end of the current domain.
    IncrementallyInterpolatedFunction
    The class IncrementallyInterpolatedFunction implements a piecewise defined functions over successive intervals where each piece is interpolated using an interpolator generator (creating an appropriate interpolating function for each) and which can be extended with new pieces at the end of its current domain by adding points.
    Interval
    The class Interval implements a real value interval used in the definition of piecewise functions.
    LeastSquaresInterpolatorGenerator
    The class LeastSquaresInterpolatorGenerator implements interpolators based on a least squares approach, producing polynomials of orders 1, 2 or 3 and able to manage a limited (in size) window of values.
    Piece
    The class Piece implements a piece in a piecewise-defined function; a piece is defined over an interval and is interpolated by a polynomial.
    Polynomial3
    The class Polynomial3 implements a polynomial function of order 3 (cubic).
    PolynomialI
    The interface PolynomialI declares the methods for classes polynomial functions.
    ValueHistory
    The class ValueHistory implements a history mechanism for model variables to memorise its most recent values over a predefined time sliding window in a buffer.
    ValueHistory.HistoricValue
    The class HistoricValue implements a value that can be recorded in a value history.
